metadata.description: Reference test cases for Convex bond pricing library validation

curve_bootstrap.description: Treasury curve bootstrap from par yields
Piecewise bootstrap from deposits and swaps (iterative Brent)
curve_bootstrap.notes: Piecewise bootstrap should achieve exact fit to market quotes within solver tolerance
Flat input rates should produce approximately flat zero curve

curve_bootstrap.description: Compare piecewise and global fit methods
curve_bootstrap.notes: Piecewise should achieve tighter fit than global on simple deposit curves

real_world_bonds.notes: Based on Boeing 7.5% 06/15/2025 bond structure. Accrued days should be 134.
